description.value:
The barbarian howls during combat, agitating nearby fauna. Willing animals and magical beasts within 30 feet of the barbarian gain the benefits of the rage spell for as long as she maintains her rage. After the barbarianâ€™s rage ends, creatures affected by her rage are fatigued for the same number of rounds as the barbarian.

A barbarian must be at least 6th level to choose this rage power.
